Text:
Awesome rip. Excellent show. If only the subs weren't hardcoded. I guess it's a good way to learn Swedish.

Thanks!
Is there any way to remove the subs? or failing that, anyone got an english copy without them?
There must be a way to kill the SE subs.    I've been looking for this series for a long time.  I just saw the DVD box set on clearance for $70.  I should prolly just buy it.
if you want just English search mv group with Google they have it on torrents.
